OrgName: Sony Music Entertainment (formerly Sony BMG Music Entertainment)
activities: Sony Music Entertainment receives or will receive human resources information (including some personal information) regarding its employees and those of its subsidiary, Sony Music Entertainment (International) Limited, and of affiliates of this subsidiary, who are based in the EU.
